basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HCV NS3 helicase protein)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.18479669]Hepatitis C virus (HCV):inhibition of HCV helicase activity(IC50=24.3±1.8 μM);West Nile virus (WNV):inhibition of WNV helicase activity(IC50=33.6±3.5 μM);Japanese encephalitis virus (JEV):inhibition of JEV helicase activity(IC50=47.2±4.7 μM).
